item.title: @elonmusk: The researcher who put together these numbers was investigated and almost charged with a crime for b...
item.description: The researcher who put together these numbers was investigated and almost charged with a crime for bringing these numbers to light when she hadn't received permission. Now we have an update that goes through 2020! First: Where are Sweden's rapists from? Mostly not Sweden.

The more you drive with FSD, the less you pay. As FSD versions improve, prices go down."

I cannot go.â€ Eva Vlaardingerbroek commits herself to saving Europe in the latest episode of The Liz Truss Show after being Banned from Britain.

item.title: @elonmusk: Rachael Anderson would have turned 32 yrs old this coming Wednesday, but that will never happen, she...
item.description: Rachael Anderson would have turned 32 yrs old this coming Wednesday, but that will never happen, she was murdered in 2018 by a complete stranger. Anthony Pardon broke into Rachael's apartment, hogtied her, gagged her, raped, strangled, beat, & stabbed her over 50X with a steak knife in the head, all on her 24th birthday. Anthony Pardon, who brutally raped & murdered Rachael Anderson, had a horrific rap sheet which included: 1. Conviction for raping a 9-month-old infant 2. Convictions for aggravated robbery, more rapes, attempted murder 3. Registered sex offender + GPS monitored 4. Repeat violent offender In what universe does an animal like that get another chance? Not in mine. Yet he was released from prison, and he started raping and killing (immediately) all over again. RIP Rachael
